name: Diabolik 3: La Fuga
overview: Diabolik 3: La Fuga is an Amiga arcade 2d adventure game released in 1993 by Simulmondo in Europe. In Beglait upset by the revolution, Altea is on the run who knows where and Ginko can do nothing to help her. Days of anxiety. Which would become real anguish, if she knew that the threatening presence of Diabolik also hangs over her.
